name: Cake War (botstarai)
description:
NOTE

  • The game can randomly crash in the browser (might be fixed now)
  • The upgrade on the top right is bugged. You have to click in the lower left corner of it.
  • The game might be a bit to hard or way too easy (Tip: try to get one upgrade to level 10. The elite can carry you throughout the game)
  • The screen will shake way too much in the later stages of the game (when you kill multiple enemies at the same time).

Welcome to Cake War.

You are not alone in this game. All your friends are now against you in this war. Kill all your friends and gain experience points to level up and become more powerful. 

Be careful, your friends will spawn faster and after every 5 minutes a boss will arrive to aid them.

Controls:

Move: WASD

Shoot: Left Click

Upgrade: Left click (top right one is bugged; you have to hover on the lower left corner to select it)

Upgrades:

All upgrades have 10 levels. After reaching level 10 on one specific skill, you unlock the elite version of that skill. The elite skill is a lot better than the normal skill.

Banana: Shoot a banana that returns to you

Banana-elite: Bananas ricochets 1 time on you (goes back and forth 2 times)

Donut: Summons a donut that spins around you

Donut-elite: Donut of Doom increases the size, damage, and speed of all donuts. 

Cone: Shoots a cone that homes towards enemies

Cone-elite: Each cone can hit enemies 5 times.

Utensil: Shoots a utensil in a random direction

Utensil-elite: All utensils homes towards enemies.

Chocolate: A small chance to spawn a chocolate when an enemy dies, dealing massive damage to enemies around it.

Chocolate-elite: Banana split. When a chocolate explodes, it also spawns 6 bananas and 12 sugar pieces.
